name: ccpm
description: Comprehensive Project Management plugin with Linear integration, smart agent auto-invocation, TDD enforcement, and quality gates. Manages Jira, Confluence, BitBucket, Slack workflows with spec management and interactive mode.

spec_management.description: Create, write, review, and sync specs with Linear Documents

planning.description: Comprehensive planning with Jira, Confluence, Slack integration

implementation.description: Agent-coordinated implementation with smart next-action detection

verification.description: Quality checks, verification, and automated fixes

completion.description: Post-completion workflows with PR creation, Jira sync, Slack notifications

utilities.description: Status tracking, context loading, reports, insights, and more

smart_agent_selection.description: Dynamic agent discovery with context-aware scoring (0-100+) and intelligent execution planning

tdd_enforcement.description: Enforces test-driven development by blocking production code without tests

quality_gates.description: Automatic code review and security audits after implementation
